item.description:
I've been to Wagamama once before, and it was fun
The food is pretty good and the atmosphere is easy going and unique.

The seating is cafeteria style with rows of long tables and benches. I think its kinda quirky and fun.

Wagamama is right off the redline at Harvard Sq and we can wonder around that area after the dinner for more drinks or whatnot.

menu & location
http://www.wagamama.u...

oh and if you've rsvp'ed, please be sure to show up :)
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Sun or our group near the front door
item.name: Dinner at Harvard Sq
